QuestData.Title: Like A Dwarf In A Mine
QuestData.Description: Baelog and Eric swear there's got to be treasure at the bottom of the mine. Why? Because it's a mine! An' we sure do love rocks that sparkle.$B$BOn our last trip, we were beaten back by huge ogres. Baelog held up the rear, swingin' his sword, while Eric rushed on ahead to try and find a quick exit.$B$BWouldn't you know, in all that excitement, I done lost my shield AGAIN?$B$B<Olaf looks at you imploringly.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect Olaf's Shield from the Bloodmaul Slag Mines.
